quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Study hard what interests you the most in the most undisciplined, irreverent, and original manner possible.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
author: B.B. King

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
author: Satya Nani

quote: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Genius is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
author: Don Marquis

quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not just about making money. It’s about making a difference.
author: Unknown

quote: You have to be odd to be number one.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Knowledge is power.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Work while they sleep. Learn while they party. Save while they spend. Live like they dream.
author: Unknown

quote: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.
author: John Ruskin

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Strive for progress, not perfection.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown
